item.title: Log4j Scanning and Detection
item.description: Lately, everyone has been talking about Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228) and likely, if you’re reading this, you’re looking for info for what to do. Most people attempted to utilize Huntress’s Log4Shell tool (https://log4shell.huntress.com/) to show connections to a LDAP server they were hosting. Some people had issues with this as it was overburdened with requests (rightfully so) or didn’t want to, or aren’t allowed to send outbound traffic to a server they didn’t own.
